summary: The diff only updates project_state.json metadata; no frontend UI code changes were made to remove delete controls from the gallery/list view or to ensure delete exists only on the edit page.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Delete artwork action(s) from the Artwork gallery/list view so that no deletion control is rendered or usable from the Gallery (artwork cards/grid) UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files (e.g., GalleryView, ArtworkCard) were modified; there is no evidence of removing delete UI or removing any delete mutation hook usage from the gallery/list components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the only UI entry point for deleting an artwork is the edit page (UploadView in edit mode) via the existing AdminUploadForm destructive Delete Artwork button; do not add alternate delete controls in the Artwork detail dialog or gallery UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files related to UploadView/AdminUploadForm or ArtworkDetailDialog were modified; there is no evidence confirming delete remains only on the edit page and absent elsewhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal project tracking entries (new_feature_requests AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is for UI/UX wiring changes in the frontend; it does not request adding or modifying project_state.json feature-request metadata.
